name: Guardforce AI Co., Limited
description: Guardforce AI Co., Limited is a leading provider of AI-driven security solutions, specializing in advanced robotics and automation technologies for various applications. Founded in 2016 and headquartered in Hong Kong, the company focuses on integrating innovative artificial intelligence with traditional security services to enhance safety and efficiency across industries. Guardforce AI develops a range of products, including autonomous mobile robots that assist in surveillance, patrolling, and other security tasks, significantly reducing the need for human intervention in high-risk environments. The company's commitment to leveraging cutting-edge AI technology positions it at the forefront of the rapidly evolving security landscape. Additionally, Guardforce AI offers a suite of software solutions designed for real-time data analytics, enhancing decision-making processes and operational efficiency for its clients. By merging AI technology with established security practices, Guardforce AI aims to redefine the standards of security services, providing reliable, efficient, and comprehensive solutions to meet the diverse needs of businesses and organizations worldwide. The company is also focused on expanding its market presence internationally, aiming to provide its innovative security solutions to a global audience.
